JavaDoq: PaliHarvardKyotoToVelthuis.java   
01 package de.pali.transliteration;
02 
03 import java.util.HashMap;
04 
05 import de.general.transliteration.ITransliterator;
06 
07 public class PaliHarvardKyotoToVelthuis implements ITransliterator {
08 
09     ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
10     // Constants
11     ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
12 
13     ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
14     // Variables
15     ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
16 
17     private static final HashMap<String, String> transliterationSchema;
18 
19     ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
20     // Constructors
21     ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
22 
23     /**
24      * Constructor.
25      */
26     public PaliHarvardKyotoToVelthuis()
27     {
28     }
29 
30     static {
31         transliterationSchema = new HashMap<String, String>();
32         transliterationSchema.put("A", "aa");
33         transliterationSchema.put("I", "ii");
34         transliterationSchema.put("U", "uu");
35         transliterationSchema.put("L", ".l");
36         transliterationSchema.put("M", ".m");
37         transliterationSchema.put("H", ".h");
38         transliterationSchema.put("G", "\"n");
39         transliterationSchema.put("J", "~n");
40         transliterationSchema.put("T", ".t");
41         transliterationSchema.put("D", ".d");
42         transliterationSchema.put("N", ".n");
43         transliterationSchema.put("S", ".s");
44     }
45     ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
46     // Methods
47     ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
48 
49     @Override
50     public String fromSchema()
51     {
52         return "VH";
53     }
54 
55     @Override
56     public String toSchema()
57     {
58         return "HKC";
59     }
60 
61     @Override
62     public String transliterate(String text)
63     {
64         StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
65         for (char c : text.toCharArray()) {
66             String x = transliterationSchema.get("" + c);
67             if (x != null) {
68                 sb.append(x);
69             } else {
70                 sb.append(c);
71             }
72         }
73         return sb.toString();
74     }   
75 }
  JavaDoq: PaliHarvardKyotoToVelthuis.java
